resources.name: Sabotage
resources.text:
At the start of the battle, place 5 Mission Tokens on top of this card.

Once per round, one of your ships may:

1) When attacking, spend 1 Mission Token from this card to force the defending ship to re-roll up to 2 dice of your choice. OR

2) When attacking, spend 1 Mission Token from this card to force the defending ship to roll 1 less defense die. OR

3) When defending, spend 1 Mission Token from this card to force the attacking ship to re-roll up to 2 dice of your choice. OR

4) When defending, spend 1 Mission Token from this card to force the attacking ship to roll 1 less attack die.

When there are no more Mission Tokens left on this card, remove it from the game.
